title: [GOLD-XX]: Add in-CRM copy/insert actions for Guidance outputs (no copy/paste workflow)

sections.text: Implement action controls inside the CRM-embedded Guidance panel to let reps use generated guidance without leaving the CRM. Provide one-click copy-to-clipboard for each guidance block (next action, risk alert text, positioning snippets) and an “Insert into CRM” action that writes the selected text into supported targets (e.g., Salesforce Task/Note or HubSpot Note/Activity) for the current Account/Opportunity. Ensure actions respect record context and show clear success/error feedback to reduce adoption friction.
